pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber: Final Stage (2021, stage show)$(br2)Used to access Saber's $(l:saber/riders/saber#ultimate_bahamut)Ultimate Bahamut$(/l) form

Obtained by using $(l:saber/items/blank_wonder_ride_book)Blank Wonder Ride Books$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/sword_of_logos_book_analyzer)Sword of Logos Book Analyzer$(/l) while having the $(l:saber/items/tassel_dark_wonder_ride_book)Tassel Dark Wonder Ride Books$(/l) in your inventory
